ComicInfo.Summary:
SELF-CONTAINED ISSUE
Malcolm and Maxine have a madcap adventure fraught with peril: a day in the life of Savage Dragon.
Note: This issue has back-up comics of:
Jim Stenstrum's Tales of the Siberian Snowtroopers #1-2 (illus. by Erik Larsen) Click Here by di Paolo & Kunker Draw Brandon Draw, by Brandon B. Goodbye, by Brandon J. Carr Pin-Up:
Thunder-Head by Raven Perez
